lines.text: ...The sticker was stuck to the Go Wizard's back, and the bullet only hit it after it went through him!
...Not really how it works. Unless it's piercin', a bullet's supposed to get lodged in the target.
If it made it through that far, it wouldn't have the speed to go out and kill Slick, too.
...And why would there be a sticker on his back?
Yeah, and I'm sure you'd know all about fashion.
Hey, shut up! I'm like a deity of fashion, here! Have you looked at me?
